docblock.description: Client that interacts with Imbo servers
docblock.long-description: This client includes methods that can be used to easily interact with Imbo servers.

docblock.description: Public key used for signed requests
Private key used for signed requests

tag.name: param
tag.description: One or more URLs to the Imbo server, including protocol

docblock.description: Generate an image identifier based on the data of the image

tag.description: The URL to send a request to

tag.name: param
tag.description: The URL to send a request to

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns a string with the necessary parts for authenticating

docblock.description: Fetch the complete URL including optional query parameters
Get the complete URL as an URL-encoded string
Resets the URL - removes all query parameters
Method for adding query parameters to the URL

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the param. For instance "page" or "t[]"

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value of the param. For instance "10" or "border:width=50,height=50"

docblock.description: Magic call method that can be used to add simple query parameters to the URL
docblock.long-description:
This method must be implemented in such a fashion that users can call non-existing methods on the URL instance that will be added as query parameters.

$url = new ImboClient\Url\Images('http://imbo', 'publicKey', 'privateKey');
$url->page(2)->limit(10);

echo $url; // http://imbo/users/publicKey/images?page=2&limit=10

tag.name: param
tag.description: The method called (will be used as query parameter name)

tag.name: param
tag.description: Arguments to the method. The first argument will be used as query parameter value

docblock.long-description: This method should proxy to getUrl()

tag.name: param
tag.description: The URL to generate the token for

tag.name: param
tag.description: The key to use when generating the token

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns an access token for a URL. Given the same URL and key combo this method returns the same token every time.

docblock.description: Delete an image from the server
Get the number of images currently stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

docblock.description: Get an array of images currently stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns false on error, and an array of ImboClient\Url\Images\ImageInterface instances on success (can be empty)

docblock.description: Get the binary data of an image stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

docblock.description: Get the binary data of an image stored on the server
docblock.long-description: If the server responds with an error, this method must return false.

tag.name: param
tag.description: URL instance for the image you want to retrieve

docblock.long-description:
This method returns an associative array with the following keys:

  • width: Width of the image in pixels
  • height: Height of the image in pixels
  • size: Size of the image in bytes

If the image does not exist on the server, this method returns false.

docblock.description: Generate an image identifier for a given file

tag.name: return
tag.description: The image identifier to use with the imbo server

tag.name: return
